Text.Page:
You're looking for a crown? Sorry, but I don't make those anymore. The soft fey hair is just too hard to come by, and people were getting a little too aggressive with the fey to get it.

Unless you have some you inherited from a rich uncle or something, no crown for you.4

Okay, I won't ask how you got thisâ€”just...don't bring me any more, okay?

Now, what color do you want?4
Just leave those poor fey alone, all right? You don't need a crown that badly.
